Text:
i agree.. only difference is that riddlerA always have subtitles with video...

a guy like me, who is like kapil dev (hindi is bad and english is worse).. would want to have the subtitles  ;)

I have absolutely no idea how you got this movie down to that size while keeping the aspect ratio intact, but that's cool. I think I'll download this out of curiosity. I know the technology has gotten better, so maybe compression has too. Thanks for the upload.

English subs for this torrent is available here:
http://subscene.com/english/unbreakable/subtitle-12306.aspx
I forgot to report back on this. The quality really is amazing givin the small file size. It's as good as the 699.97 MiB one. Only smaller.
